snippet.title: Chopper remembered as 70s icon
snippet.description:
1 June 2012
The iconic Raleigh Chopper bike, first put into production in 1970, is being fondly remembered after the death at the age of 85 of its designer…

snippet.title: Raleigh Chopper was designer Alan Oakley's 'favourite'
snippet.description:
21 May 2012
The widow of the creator of the Raleigh Chopper has said the bike was one of his favourite designs for the Nottingham company.

snippet.title: Raleigh Chopper designer Alan Oakley dies from cancer
snippet.description:
Nottingham / 20 May 2012
The man who designed Raleigh's iconic Chopper bicycle has died after a battle with cancer. Alan Oakley, 85 and from Nottingham, home of the bike…

snippet.title: Performance guru Gary Coltman swaps Manchester for Glasgow
snippet.description:
Cycling / 22 April 2013
Championships, then three top-10 stage finishes in the Tour of Britain in 1994. What's more, he later built the Team Raleigh mountain bike team…
